content.html: when we stopped literally demonizing and torturing left handed people, the number of them on record shot up, because people felt safer admitting it the actual proportion of left handed people in society didn't change, and right-handed kids were not 'groomed' to left handedness
content.value:
when we stopped literally demonizing and torturing left handed people, the number of them on record shot up, because people felt safer admitting it

the actual proportion of left handed people in society didn't change, and right-handed kids were not 'groomed' to left handedness
